clusterConfigurations.description: The configuration of the cluster from which the snapshot was taken.

clusterName.description: Name of the MemoryDB cluster to take a snapshot of.

kmsKeyArn.description: ARN of the KMS key used to encrypt the snapshot at rest.

name.description: Name of the snapshot. If omitted, the provider will assign a random, unique name. Conflicts with `name_prefix`.

namePrefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified prefix. Conflicts with `name`.

source.description: Indicates whether the snapshot is from an automatic backup (`automated`) or was created manually (`manual`).

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Snapshot resources.
